name: Sparkman 2
description:
Rescue Sparkman before it explode by removing red staff！

Solving little tasks and try to collect all 3 stars and pass the levels.

A super addictive puzzle game，basing on the laws of physics. Try your best to find your own solution to finish the task in games, so be creative and don't be afraid to think out of the box!

Why you will get addicted:
* Easy to play：Tap red staff to help Sparkman reach water to complete levels!
* Challenging but funny：Get fun from diverse tasks.

Endless gameplay and upgrade are coming soon!
